hooks.command: bash -c 'cd /home/user/vibed-nix && ./install-nix.sh && NIX_BIN=$(find /nix/store -path "*/nix-*/bin" -type d | sort -r | head -1) && echo "export PATH=\"$NIX_BIN:\$PATH\"" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE"'

bash -c 'cd /home/user/vibed-nix && NIX_BIN=$(find /nix/store -path "*/nix-*/bin" -type d | sort -r | head -1) && if [ -d "$NIX_BIN" ]; then eval "$($NIX_BIN/nix print-dev-env --profile /tmp/nix-shell-profile)" && echo "source /tmp/nix-shell-profile/dev-env" >> "$CLAUDE_ENV_FILE"; fi'
